defaults.description: Aramark is committed to purchase only cage-free eggs by 2020 in the U.S. and globally by 2025.
Aramark is committed to source 100% of contracted seafood from responsible sources by 2018.- by Enterprise guidelines.
Aramark is committed to phasing out the routine use of antibiotics for use as growth promoters or disease prevention across poultry, beef, pork and seafood categories in our supply chain.
Aramark is committed to purchase only humanely-raised broiler chickens by 2024
Aramark is committed to purchasing contracted soy-based oils, specified margarines and shortenings, and beef products with no deforestation risk by 2025.
Aramark is committed to purchasing only 100% group-house pork
